about.subtitle: Empowering everyone to become a comic creator through AI technology
about.title: About Us

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To make everyone a comic creator. By lowering the barriers to comic creation through AI technology, we unleash everyone's creative potential and turn imagination into beautiful visual stories.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To build the world's leading AI comic creation platform, making comic creation simple, fun, and efficient. We believe that everyone has an amazing story waiting to be told.

aiGeneration.title: AI Smart Generation
aiGeneration.description: Advanced AI algorithms automatically generate complete comic stories based on your descriptions, including storyboards, dialogues, and visuals

multipleStyles.title: Multiple Styles
multipleStyles.description: Support for Japanese manga, American comics, Chinese comics and more. AI intelligently analyzes content and selects the most suitable style

fastCreation.title: Fast Creation
fastCreation.description: Complete the entire process from idea to finished product in minutes, dramatically improving creative efficiency

communitySharing.title: Community Sharing
communitySharing.description: Share your work with one click, connect with creators worldwide, and receive likes and feedback

cta.title: Start Your Comic Creation Journey
cta.description: No drawing skills required, no complex software needed, just your imagination. Let AI help you realize your comic dreams!

studio.title: AI Couplet Studio
studio.subtitle: Enter a prompt, AI intelligently generates couplets that meet tonal and rhyming requirements

prompt.label: Enter theme or top/bottom line
prompt.placeholder: e.g., New Year celebration, business opening, or enter top line: Spring breeze brings success, or enter bottom line: See all Chang'an flowers in one day
prompt.hint: üí° You can enter a theme description, or enter a top line or bottom line, AI will automatically generate complete couplets

tips.title: Creation Tips
items: You can enter a theme description, AI will automatically generate multiple couplets
You can also enter a top line or bottom line, AI will automatically complete the other half
Supports any theme input, such as New Year, business opening, wedding, etc.
After generation, multiple couplets will be displayed, each with detailed analysis

examples.title: Example Prompts
items: New Year celebration, wishing family health and happiness
Business opening, prosperous business
Wedding blessing, eternal love
School culture, diligent learning

refund.subtitle: We are committed to providing satisfactory services to users. Please refer to this policy for refund requests
refund.title: Refund Policy

items: Only supports refunds for orders purchased directly through this website.
You can apply for a refund within 14 days after purchase. Late applications may not be accepted.
If you are dissatisfied with subscriptions or digital products, please contact customer service via email support@xuanwhale.com and provide order information.
conditions.title: Refund Application Conditions

contact.description: If you have any questions about the refund policy, please feel free to contact us through the following methods:
contact.title: Contact Us

items: After receiving your refund request, we will process it within 3 business days.
After the refund is processed, funds may take several business days to arrive, depending on the payment channel.
In case of special circumstances (such as payment channel issues), we will contact you promptly.
process.title: Refund Process and Instructions

content.description: Comic content you create and share must:
items: Comply with laws, regulations, and moral standards

Not contain false or misleading information
Not involve violent, hateful, or discriminatory content
Not contain spam or malicious content

disclaimer.description: To the extent permitted by law, we are not responsible for:
items: The accuracy or completeness of AI-generated comic content
Content from third-party websites or services
Indirect losses arising from the use of services

Losses caused by users violating the terms
disclaimer.title: Disclaimer

intellectual.description: Important information about comic work intellectual property:
items: The website itself and its AI technology are protected by intellectual property rights
You retain rights to the comic works you create
You authorize us to display your comic works within the scope of our services
Please ensure you have the right to share the comic content you publish
Respect others' intellectual property rights and do not plagiarize or misappropriate others' works

modification.description: We may update these terms of service from time to time. For significant changes, we will notify you through website notifications or email. Continuing to use the service indicates your acceptance of the updated terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, please stop using our services.

responsibility.description: When using our AI comic creation services, you agree to:

step4.desc: After successful redemption, immediately enjoy all VIP membership exclusive benefits

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Where can I get redeem codes?
faq.a1: Redeem codes can be obtained through official events, VIP membership purchases, or gifts from friends.
faq.q2: Do redeem codes have expiration dates?
faq.a2: Yes, redeem codes usually have expiration dates, please use them within the validity period.
faq.q3: What should I do if redemption fails?
faq.a3: Please check if the redeem code is correct, or contact customer service for help.
faq.q4: Can redeem codes be used multiple times?
faq.a4: Each redeem code can only be used once and becomes invalid after use.

ordersPage.title: Order Management
ordersPage.pageDesc: View your VIP membership purchase history and order details
ordersPage.noOrdersDesc: You haven't purchased any VIP membership yet

benefitsPage.title: Membership Benefits
benefitsPage.subtitle: Learn about exclusive VIP membership benefits

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Common questions about VIP membership
faqPage.a1: VIP membership is Pairray Couplet's paid membership service, providing more AI generation times, advanced models, exclusive templates and other benefits.
faqPage.q2: How to upgrade to VIP membership?
faqPage.a2: You can choose a plan to purchase on the membership page, or use a redeem code to activate membership.
faqPage.a3: According to our refund policy, refunds can be requested under certain conditions.
faqPage.q4: Will data be lost after membership expires?
faqPage.a4: No, all your data will be preserved, you just won't be able to enjoy VIP benefits.

plansFaq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
plansFaq.a1: Yes, you can cancel your membership subscription at any time, and the purchased membership time will remain valid until expiration.
plansFaq.a2: We support WeChat Pay, Alipay, bank cards and other payment methods, safe and convenient.
plansFaq.a3: We will continuously optimize membership benefits, and new features will be prioritized for VIP members.
plansFaq.a4: VIP members enjoy 24-hour exclusive customer service support, and can contact us through multiple channels.
